derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (originally denoting the jargon or slang of criminals): from French, of unknown origin

entry.def: An argot is a special language used by a particular group of people, which other people find difficult to understand.

means.word_mean: 1. a characteristic language of a particular group (as among thieves);
